article.title: Honeywell Awarded $219 Million to Support U.S. Air Force Satellite Control Network
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Honeywell Technology Solutions of Colorado Springs, Colorado, was awarded a $219 million contract modification to provide systems and maintenance engineering, network support integration, on-site and off-site depot level maintenance and software maintenance of the U.S. Air Force Satellite Control Network. Space and Missile Systems Center, Peterson Air Force Base, Colorado, is the contracting activity.
